thread.title: Maldives plunges deeper into political turmoil

title: Maldives plunges deeper into political turmoil
text:
Maldives plunges deeper into political turmoil Tuesday, February 06, 2018 - 01:41 
Maldives President Abdulla Yameen on Monday declared a state of emergency, ordered security forces into the supreme court and arrested a former president, in moves the opposition called a ''purge'' in the Indian Ocean island nation.   
Maldives President Abdulla Yameen on Monday declared a state of emergency, ordered security forces into the supreme court and arrested a former president, in moves the opposition called a "purge" in the Indian Ocean island nation.  //reut.rs/2BcrEUI
